title: Episode 355 - Sex Geeks and Freaks
itunes:title: Episode 355 - Sex Geeks and Freaks
itunes:subtitle: Emily goes on a date with her crush from the fifth grade and should Menace try having sober sex? Should you date a divorced man who had an affair? Life is too short for bad oral sex, full body kissing and how do you deal with jealousy in...
description:
Emily goes on a date with her crush from the fifth grade in Michigan. Self-proclaimed “Sex Geek and polyamorous slut” Reid Mihalko talks about how to deal with jealousy in a polyamorous relationship. He invites Emily to instruct a kissing workshop with him, which means they have to make-out.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
